try:
    x=input()
    while x>0:
        s=raw_input().split(' ')
        for i in range(len(s)):
            if s[i]=='8':
                s[i]='ate'
            elif s[i]=='w8':
                s[i]='wait'
            elif s[i]=='gr8':
                s[i]='great'
            elif s[i]=='4':
                s[i]='for'
            elif s[i]=='b4':
                s[i]='before'
        print ' '.join(s)
        x=x-1
except:
    pass
